meanings.definition: Obtain or receive from a source
meanings.sent1: She is deriving inspiration from nature for her paintings.
meanings.sent2: The company is deriving its profits from online sales.
meanings.sent3: The detective was deriving clues from the mysterious note.
meanings.sent4: Her happiness was deriving from the simple joys of life.
meanings.sent5: The chef was deriving flavors from exotic spices to create a unique dish.

meanings.definition: To come from a particular origin or source
meanings.sent1: The river is deriving its water from the melting snow in the mountains.
meanings.sent2: His passion for music is deriving from his childhood experiences.
meanings.sent3: The magician was deriving his tricks from ancient spell books.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was deriving from the support of her friends.
meanings.sent5: The strength of the team was deriving from their unity and determination.
